verbs.description: Starkad , the hero of the legends , the bravest warrior in the army of the North , [V: had] fallen into disgrace with the king because of a certain princess , so he wandered up into Norland , and settled down at Rude in Tuna , where he was known as the Thrall of the Alders or the Red Fellow .
